word: [Battle Creek] Sabbath, March 5, 1859. Stayed Home to Nurse James White.--Did not attend meeting today. My husband was sick. Have remained with him to wait upon him. The Lord met with us and blessed us this morn. I had unusual liberty in prayer. Brother John Andrews preached twice today. He spent the eve and night with us. We enjoyed the visit much.--Manuscript 5, 1859.
